user_specs: ['Hair Condition Chemically Treated (Colored, Relaxed, or Permed)', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This is a nice blush. It is the first one that isn’t super pigmented that brings life to my face. I feel bronzed and summery yet elegant and not childish. It’s a nice blend. I need to see how shimmery it is in the sunlight, but I don’t think the slight shimmer is a deal breaker. Looks great in low light. Pretty.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: i absolutely love this blush and i was so glad that it made a comeback! it's just peachy enough without being too orange. it is just shimmery enough to my taste. only downside is that it is VERY small.

user_specs: ['Hair Condition Chemically Treated (Colored, Relaxed, or Permed)', 'Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I absolutely love this blush. I was going back and forth with a few colors that I had in a blush. One was pink, bronze and a brown matte. This one seems to have a combination off all those tones and it also shimmers. It looks beautiful on. You can use it as your daily go to blush. You can always add more if you want to make it more of a dressier look. With this blush you can use any colors of eyeliner and eyeshadow. It doesn’t make you feel limited to one color scheme. I have put all of my other blushes away. This one is here to stay!!
